Teams must travel from the islands of Bocas del Toro on northern Panamas Caribbean coast, to Medellín, Colombias second largest city. Standing in their way is the notorious and dangerous Darien Gap - their only option is to bypass it by sea, enduring a lengthy, arduous and costly boat journey, putting their dwindling budgets under pressure.

The last time he couldnt train, his life spiralled out of control, so now Tommy throws himself into a frenzy of activity: a TV appearance on The Wheel, family days out with Bambi, and a final push to finish the home he hopes Molly and Bambi will soon return to.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A mild mannered, socially weird government accountant moonlights as a highly trained, and deadly assassin.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Briar and Bramble lose their mother at a very young age under mysterious circumstances. Many years later, logger Vick takes the bears to visit the Robot Research Institute, and they uncover a clue relating to their mother.

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! The Sword and the Scoob
programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the gang back to the age chivalrous knights, spell-casting wizards, and fire-breathing dragons.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: Rock Dog 2: Rock Around the Park
programme.desc: Canine rocker Bodi and his band discover the price of fame when they go on tour with pop sensation Lil Foxy.

programme.title: Rock Dog 3: Battle the Beat
programme.desc: Hoping to inspire a new generation of rock stars, Bodi joins a musical competition show and becomes an overnight TV personality sensation.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: When his wickedness is challenged, super-villain Gru hatches a plan to steal the Moon. Enlisting three young orphans to help out, his dastardly plot is derailed when he begins to care for them.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A struggling screenwriter finds himself inadvertently entangled in the criminal underworld when his knucklehead friends abduct a mobsters beloved Shih Tzu.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: Gunslinger Cole Thornton rides into a small town to work for a cattle baron, but quits after learning that his would-be employer wants to drive a family off their land and obtain their water supply. Thornton leaves the situation unresolved, but a chance encounter takes him back to El Dorado, where he joins the sheriff in a range war.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: Jim Hardy quits showbiz to run a farm with dance partner Linda Mason, but she stays on stage to pair up with Ted Hanover. A romantic merry-go-round with a spring in its step and a medley of favourite seasonal tunes by Irving Berlin.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: A long-smouldering flame is rekindled when a once-popular opera star reunites with her ex-husband and fellow performers at a retirement home for musicians.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two siblings set out on a mission to rescue their ex-spy parents. Summoned back to work from their uneventful lives, the adults run into trouble while on duty. When the children are called upon to help them, they find out about their parents former identities while at the same time developing a greater appreciation for each other.

Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Electronics store stock boy Andy Stitzer is horrified when he is found out as a virgin by his workmates - just when he thought he was becoming one of the gang. David, Jay and Cal surprise him by making it their mission to get him a girl and help him lose his virginity.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Antebellum
programme.desc: A successful author finds herself in a horrifying reality and must figure out the mystery behind it before it is too late.

programme.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
programme.desc: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy, from the perspective of his longtime girlfriend, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: Stuck in a bizarre relationship with her dead, wisecracking Army pal, a veteran reunites with her solitary grandfather at his lake house.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: The 12 Days of Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Santa gives a successful businessman 12 chances to relive the same day so he can repair his damaged relationships with his loved ones.

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: All a retired widower wants for Christmas is for his family to get along. If they can honour his wish and spend five whole, happy days together, it may just be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: A wealthy widow hires private investigator Val Barber to find her missing granddaughter. As dark secrets start to surface, Barber finds himself entangled with shady and powerful men who are determind to thwart his investigation.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders unravels a web of small-town lies while investigating the bizarre murders of two women with the same name. He meets and quickly falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour whos eager to help solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Godfather, Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Ex-don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielbergs 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Oceans gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Dannys old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. Using his codename Condor, he contacts the CIA, but when an agent tries to kill him, he kidnaps a stranger off the street to ensure his survival and attempts to turn the tables on those who want him dead.

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Shop clerk Clarence falls for a prostitute, steals a fortune in cocaine and goes on the run, pursued by psychotic mobster Vincenzo.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A glamorous career woman loses control when her married lover, a Manhattan attorney, ends their brief affair. Unable to accept his rejection, she pursues him at the office, and then at his home, eventually drawing his wife and daughter into the confrontation.

programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: A wealthy widow hires private investigator Val Barber to find her missing granddaughter. As dark secrets start to surface, Barber finds himself entangled with shady and powerful men who are determind to thwart his investigation.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life

Travelling on to North Africa, the rainforests of Australia and the east coast of Scotland, Attenborough discovers how animals evolved to conquer not only the oceans but also the land and air.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough

programme.title: Attack and Defend
programme.desc: Indisputable apex predators and unassuming-but-lethal prey wage war in natures daily battle royal for the right to live another day. From carnivorous cheetahs, polar bears and sharks to exploding blast ants, vomiting fulmar birds and slime-excreting hagfish, those who attack and those who defend have developed specialized skills in their ongoing struggle to survive. Witness the masters of predator-prey conflict as they showcase their intimidating and extraordinary tactics.

programme.desc: Chimp Bens mysterious infection has spread to some of the others in his group, and its a race against time to diagnose and treat it effectively. Meanwhile, the orang-utans are watching their weight, but are not so keen to get onto the scales. Plus, the lemurs and stump-tailed macaques meet for the first time - could they become housemates?

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimp Bens foot infection has led to the amputation of one of his toes. Just as hes improving, Honey, one of the chimps in Hananyas house, is struck down by the mysterious bacterial infection - and it is serious.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia
programme.desc: While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes.

programme.title: Big Beasts: Last of the Giants
programme.desc: New and Exclusive. Africa: Patrick Aryee tracks down great white sharks, desert giraffes and one of the last tusker elephants as he explores the challenges facing natures giants. (3 of 3)

programme.title: Wild Family Ties
programme.desc: Making our first friends is something we cant forget and its the same in the wild. Here, discover the importance of having allies and gaining trust in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Explore a different side of the Tasmanian devil, meet a pioneering sea turtle, enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer, and play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat, celebrate a pigs rescue-versary, and learn how to speak baboon with Dingani, who has developed a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, see celebrity groundhogs, dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Embrace an invasive nutria who has become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum, explore a swimmers bond with wild grey seals, and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: Weird, Wild and Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colourful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: In Vietnam, black-shanked douc Peter is fitted with a GPS collar before being released into the wild with his group and there are juicy melons for the spider monkeys.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Disabled chimp Chocolate has a new friend and everyones surprised by just who wants to be her pal.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: In spite of possessing appearances that people often find disgusting, creepy crawlers are endowed with extraordinary survival skills.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Creatures that appear to possess body parts of different animals - sometimes unrelated to each other - can be very tricky to classify.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is full of creatures with tricks up their sleeve, which they use to transform themselves and deceive others.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Modern science has unearthed and compiled compelling evidence for an evolutionary connection between dinosaurs and birds.

programme.title: Wild Canary Islands
programme.desc: When rocks engulfed by flames emerge from the middle of the ocean, new opportunities arise for the species that manage to reach them... This is the case of the Canary Islands, eight islands born from fire, that form an archipelago full of life.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys across the globe to discover how the earliest animals developed on our planet. Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. Travelling on to North Africa, the rainforests of Australia and the east coast of Scotland, Attenborough discovers how animals evolved to conquer not only the oceans but also the land and air.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Right beneath our feet is a secret world of disguise and espionage, social networking and courtship, rape and pillage, parenthood and relationships. Sir David Attenborough investigates how macroscopic residents outwit their enemies to survive.

programme.title: Attack and Defend
programme.desc: Indisputable apex predators and unassuming-but-lethal prey wage war in natures daily battle royal for the right to live another day. From carnivorous cheetahs, polar bears and sharks to exploding blast ants, vomiting fulmar birds and slime-excreting hagfish, those who attack and those who defend have developed specialized skills in their ongoing struggle to survive. Witness the masters of predator-prey conflict as they showcase their intimidating and extraordinary tactics.

programme.title: Attack and Defend

programme.title: Jaguar Journals
programme.desc: Biologist and conservationist Lizzie Daly ventures into the Pantanal, where she uses the latest tagging technology to gain insights into the fascinating lives of a group of jaguars.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: A Great Dane assists a 13-year-old girl living with a limiting condition and a Border Collie helps the California Task Force search for survivors. Meanwhile Ruger sniffs out illegal poachers in Zambia.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: At a South African airport, bird-chasing Border Collies are preventing potentially devastating collisions with aircraft. In the British countryside a Sprocker Spaniels extraordinary sense of smell are playing a vital life-saving role.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: Three locations, one investigation. The Heritage Centre, Laffertys Pub, and The Bell Inn give Derby a claim on the title of the most haunted city in Europe. programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: The team visits the Skirrid Inn in Abergavenny, the oldest pub in Wales, where more than 100 people were hanged. A door seems to be opening and closing of its own volition, but can the team find a rational explanation?

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: Three locations, one investigation. The Heritage Centre, Laffertys Pub, and The Bell Inn give Derby a claim on the title of the most haunted city in Europe. Bodies under the floor at the Heritage Centre; a skull - believed to belong to a murdered woman at Laffertys; and a room that no one will stay in at the Bell Inn, make this investigation one of the most challenging and frightening of the series.
